title: "Are the alleged dangers of Magnétisme justified? Responses from experts and debunking medical myths"
first_phrase: The last 200 tokens of this text address the supposed dangers of magnetism and attempts by some medical professionals to monopolize it. The author defends the safety and efficacy of magnetism, citing the experiences of themselves and others, and argues that the true danger lies in the efforts of some to suppress and discredit its study. The text also touches on the controversial issue of lucid somnambulism and its relationship to magnetism, as well as the potential for abuse of hypnotized subjects. Despite these concerns, the author remains steadfast in their belief in the value and potential of magnetism in the field of medicine.

last_phrase: The potential dangers of hypnotism and magnetism have been widely debated by professionals in the field. While there is always a possibility of unwanted effects on mental faculties, both practices can be safely carried out on healthy and willing individuals. It is important to approach these practices with caution and to seek out experienced practitioners.
